body_html:
I think you need to restart the kernel when doing it in colab. Colab behaves weirdly when loading the checkpoints if the kernel is not restarted. I think it retains some weights or something else is happening.

Can you try restarting the kernel and then don't train the model but just load the checkpoints?
body_text:
I think you need to restart the kernel when doing it in colab. Colab behaves weirdly when loading the checkpoints if the kernel is not restarted. I think it retains some weights or something else is happening.
Can you try restarting the kernel and then don't train the model but just load the checkpoints?
body:
I think you need to restart the kernel when doing it in colab. Colab behaves weirdly when loading the checkpoints if the kernel is not restarted. I think it retains some weights or something else is happening. 

Can you try restarting the kernel and then don't train the model but just load the checkpoints?
